title: WILDLIFE.PARK.3.DOWN.UNDER-SiGMAA
description: Title: Wildlife Park 3 – Down Under Genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy Developer: “b-alive gmbh” Publisher: “b-alive gmbh” Release Date: 19 Apr, 2018 Crack: PLAZA Visit the home of koalas and kangaroos. From the Great Barrier Reef to the outback, the Aboriginal homeland of Australia. The continent offers a wide range of fauna and flora: Kangaroos, koalas, emus-and of course – the tousled wombat and the strange platypus, the "landmarks " from Down Under. Keep sea creatures like sharks, dwarf saw rays, dolphins and wall reef turtles as well as reptiles like the perentie and the freshwater crocodiles. In the australian wildlife you will also find birds like cormorants and eyeglasses pelicans as well as the colourful helmet cassowary, a primevally maddish bird. Wildlife Park’s flora is expanded with ‘Down under’ around Australia’s typical eucalyptus trees. For visitors to your Australian wildlife Park, you’ll have a variety of new service facilities from Shark Trashcan to Infodoos, a Sydney Opera Restaurant, Outback Toilets to tourist attractions such as Submarine Diving on the Great Barrier Reef and Helicopter Tours available. Lastly, you decorate your ‘Down Under’ Park with many typical decorations such as didgeridoos, surfboards and the famous Ayers Rock. "Down Under"-Features: 20 autralische Land- und Wasserierarten wie z.B. Kanguruhs, Koalas, Emus, Wombats, Krokodile, Delfine und natürlich Haie. 3 Themenpark-Attraktionen, u.a. UBoot-Tauchen am Great Barrier 10 Besuchereinrichtungen wie das Sydney-Opera-Restaurant und Outback-Toiletten 7 Dekorationen mit verschiedenen Variationen wie Ayersrock, Digeridoos, Boomerang- und Surfboard-Schilder 2 Eukalyptus-Baumarten 1. Install the game. 2. Copy over the cracked content from the /PLAZA directory to your game install directory. 3. Play the game. 4. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT! Screenshots: https://i.imgur.com/KSCfgFx.jpg https://i.imgur.com/dBeBc2D.jpg Trailer
